title: N-600K | Application for Citizenship and Issuance of Certificate Under Section 322
description: Children who regularly reside in a foreign country may use this form to claim U.S. citizenship based on their parents.

filings.category: If you are filing on behalf of a child who is the subject of a final adoption for immigration purposes and meets the definition of child under the Immigration and Nationality Act section 101(b)(1)(E), (F), or (G).
